tooltipBody: Forge your units to gain new powers.

greetings.dialogue: You've come to the right place!

thanks.dialogue: You purchased something? Well, thank you!
Wonderful! Let me just wipe it off for you first...

chatter.dialogue: Clutter adds character! Or something like that...
Don't listen to my cousins, I have more than just junk!
Oh the webs? There's nothing dangerous in here...probably.
Please, please! Let me know if you see something you like!
Ahh, you saw my cousins? How are those mangy merchants!?

bothered.dialogue: Quit poking me or you'll be leaving here with one less finger!

name: UnitUpgradeMerchantLateDEPRECATED
